description: Bringing a rare blend of expertise in thermal, mechanical, and computational engineering, I provide a versatile skill set to drive high-impact projects and solutions across diverse domains.

roles.title: Thermal Engineering
roles.summary: Heat management is a critical bottleneck in nearly every emerging technology. Having studied and applied special topics in conduction, convection, and radiation, I specialize in tackling these challenges so you can focus on innovating.
key_benefits: Proven track record in system optimization

roles.title: Mechanical Engineering
roles.summary: With hands-on experience developing resilient mechanical systems for demanding environments, I am capable of leading the design of critical hardware from concept to production, always balancing technical feasibility with cost-effectiveness.
key_benefits: Expertise in mechanical design and analysis
Strong background in FEA and mechanical reliability
Ability to ensure performance in real-world environments

roles.title: Computational Engineering
roles.summary: Have a problem thats too complex, or does your optimization keep stalling? With my expertise in high-performance computing, I can transform your time-to-solve from months into a matter of days, while ensuring precision and reliability at every step.
key_benefits: Proven ability to optimize algorithms for speed
Experience with multi-threading and large-scale simulations
